    • Constructor Detail

      • TrackerConfiguration

        public TrackerConfiguration(java.lang.String namespace,
                            java.lang.String appId)
        Create a TrackerConfiguration instance. The namespace is the unique identifier for the instance. By default, the platform is ServerSideApp, and JSONs will be base64 encoded.
        Parameters:
        namespace - identifier for the Tracker instance
        appId - application ID
